description.value:
You have learned some of the tricks the fey use to bend primal magic toward illusions and trickery.

Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Illusory Disguise], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Illusory Object], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Illusory Scene], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Veil] to your spell list as primal spells.
